item.name: CopyItem

exec: // Verify that we received a 200 status and save the folderId of the contacts folder to the environment.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope
    xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
    xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
    <soap:Header>
        <t:RequestServerVersion Version="Exchange2007_SP1"/>
    </soap:Header>
    <soap:Body>
        <m:GetFolder
            xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages"
            xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
            <m:FolderShape>
                <t:BaseShape>IdOnly</t:BaseShape>
            </m:FolderShape>
            <m:FolderIds>
                <t:DistinguishedFolderId Id="contacts"></t:DistinguishedFolderId>
                <t:DistinguishedFolderId Id="notes"></t:DistinguishedFolderId>
                <t:DistinguishedFolderId Id="calendar"></t:DistinguishedFolderId>
                <t:DistinguishedFolderId Id="tasks"></t:DistinguishedFolderId>
            </m:FolderIds>
        </m:GetFolder>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

request.description: EWS GetFolder request in order to get the folderId of the contacts folder to be used when creating a contact

exec: // Create a message with an attachment
Subject: Acceptance Test Message with Attachment

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope
    xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
    xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
    <soap:Header>
        <t:RequestServerVersion Version="Exchange2007_SP1"/>
    </soap:Header>
    <soap:Body>
        <m:CreateItem MessageDisposition="SaveOnly"
            xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages"
            xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
            <m:Items>
                <t:Message>
                    <t:MimeContent>{{BASE64_MESSAGE}}</t:MimeContent>
                    <t:Importance>Normal</t:Importance>
                    <t:ExtendedProperty>
                        <t:ExtendedFieldURI PropertyName="MessageNotJunkFlag" PropertySetId="A7B529B5-4B75-47A7-A24F-20743D6C55CD" PropertyType="Boolean"/>
                        <t:Value>true</t:Value>
                    </t:ExtendedProperty>
                    <t:ExtendedProperty>
                        <t:ExtendedFieldURI PropertyTag="0xe07" PropertyType="Integer"/>
                        <t:Value>1</t:Value>
                    </t:ExtendedProperty>
                    <t:ExtendedProperty>
                        <t:ExtendedFieldURI PropertyTag="0x1090" PropertyType="Integer"/>
                        <t:Value>0</t:Value>
                    </t:ExtendedProperty>
                </t:Message>
            </m:Items>
        </m:CreateItem>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
  xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
    <soap:Body>
        <DeleteItem DeleteType="HardDelete" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages">
            <ItemIds>
                <t:ItemId Id="{{itemId}}" ChangeKey="{{itemChangeKey}}" />
                <t:ItemId Id="{{copiedItemId}}" ChangeKey="{{copiedItemChangeKey}}" />
            </ItemIds>
        </DeleteItem>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

exec: // Verify that we received a 200 status and save the newly created contact's itemId and itemChangeKey to the environment.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope
    xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
    xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
    <soap:Header>
        <t:RequestServerVersion Version="Exchange2007_SP1"/>
    </soap:Header>
    <soap:Body>
        <m:CreateItem MessageDisposition="SaveOnly"
            xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages"
            xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
            <m:SavedItemFolderId>
                <t:FolderId Id="{{contactsFolderId}}"/>
            </m:SavedItemFolderId>
            <m:Items>
                <t:Contact>
                    <t:FileAsMapping>LastCommaFirst</t:FileAsMapping>
                    <t:DisplayName>Fozzy Bear</t:DisplayName>
                    <t:GivenName>Fozzy</t:GivenName>
                    <t:Surname>Bear</t:Surname>
                    <t:CompanyName>HCL</t:CompanyName>
                    <t:EmailAddresses>
                        <t:Entry Key="EmailAddress1">fozzy.bear@fakemail.com</t:Entry>
                    </t:EmailAddresses>
                    <t:PhoneNumbers>
                        <t:Entry Key="MobilePhone">9195551212</t:Entry>
                    </t:PhoneNumbers>
                    <t:PhysicalAddresses>
                        <t:Entry Key="Home">
                            <t:Street>1313 Mockingbird Ln</t:Street>
                            <t:City>Anytown</t:City>
                            <t:State>NC</t:State>
                            <t:PostalCode>27613</t:PostalCode>
                        </t:Entry>
                    </t:PhysicalAddresses>
                </t:Contact>
            </m:Items>
        </m:CreateItem>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

request.description: EWS CreateItem request for creating a contact

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
  xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
  <soap:Body>
    <DeleteItem DeleteType="HardDelete" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages">
      <ItemIds>
        <t:ItemId Id="{{itemId}}" ChangeKey="{{itemChangeKey}}" />
        <t:ItemId Id="{{copiedItemId}}" ChangeKey="{{copiedItemChangeKey}}" />
      </ItemIds>
    </DeleteItem>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

exec: // Verify that we received a 200 status and save the newly created note's itemId and itemChangeKey to the environment.
// Parse our the itemId and itemChangeKey and save them to the environment

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope
    xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
    xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
    <soap:Header>
        <t:RequestServerVersion Version="Exchange2007_SP1"/>
    </soap:Header>
    <soap:Body>
        <m:CreateItem MessageDisposition="SaveOnly"
            xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages"
            xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
            <m:SavedItemFolderId>
                <t:FolderId Id="{{notesFolderId}}"/>
            </m:SavedItemFolderId>
            <m:Items>
                <t:Item>
                    <t:ItemClass>IPM.StickyNote</t:ItemClass>
                    <t:Subject>New Note</t:Subject>
                    <t:Body BodyType="HTML"><html><head></head><body>Test for Automation<div><br></div><div><ul class="Apple-dash-list"><li>item 1</li><li>item 2</li></ul></div></body></html></t:Body>
                    <t:ExtendedProperty>
                        <t:ExtendedFieldURI PropertyId="35584" PropertySetId="0006200E-0000-0000-c000-000000000046" PropertyType="Integer"/>
                        <t:Value>3</t:Value>
                    </t:ExtendedProperty>
                    <t:ExtendedProperty>
                        <t:ExtendedFieldURI PropertyId="35586" PropertySetId="0006200E-0000-0000-c000-000000000046" PropertyType="Integer"/>
                        <t:Value>200</t:Value>
                    </t:ExtendedProperty>
                    <t:ExtendedProperty>
                        <t:ExtendedFieldURI PropertyId="35587" PropertySetId="0006200E-0000-0000-c000-000000000046" PropertyType="Integer"/>
                        <t:Value>166</t:Value>
                    </t:ExtendedProperty>
                    <t:ExtendedProperty>
                        <t:ExtendedFieldURI PropertyId="35588" PropertySetId="0006200E-0000-0000-c000-000000000046" PropertyType="Integer"/>
                        <t:Value>110</t:Value>
                    </t:ExtendedProperty>
                    <t:ExtendedProperty>
                        <t:ExtendedFieldURI PropertyId="35589" PropertySetId="0006200E-0000-0000-c000-000000000046" PropertyType="Integer"/>
                        <t:Value>110</t:Value>
                    </t:ExtendedProperty>
                    <t:ExtendedProperty>
                        <t:ExtendedFieldURI DistinguishedPropertySetId="Common" PropertyId="34064" PropertyType="Integer"/>
                        <t:Value>272</t:Value>
                    </t:ExtendedProperty>
                </t:Item>
            </m:Items>
        </m:CreateItem>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

request.description: EWS CreateItem request for creating a note

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap:Envelope
    xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
    xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types"
    xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages">
    <soap:Header>
        <t:RequestServerVersion Version="Exchange2010_SP2" />
        <t:MailboxCulture>en-US</t:MailboxCulture>
        <t:TimeZoneContext>
            <t:TimeZoneDefinition Id="Eastern Standard Time"/>
        </t:TimeZoneContext>
    </soap:Header>
    <soap:Body>
        <GetItem
            xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages">
            <ItemShape>
                <t:BaseShape>Default</t:BaseShape>
                <t:BodyType>Text</t:BodyType>
                <t:AdditionalProperties>
                    <t:FieldURI FieldURI="item:Attachments"/>
                </t:AdditionalProperties>
            </ItemShape>
            <ItemIds>
                <t:ItemId Id="{{copiedItemId}}"/>
            </ItemIds>
        </GetItem>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

exec: // Verify that we received a 200 status and save the newly created task's itemId and itemChangeKey to the environment.
// Verify that the taskFolderId environment variable is set.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap:Envelope
    xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
    xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types"
    xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages">
    <soap:Header>
        <t:RequestServerVersion Version="V2016_04_13" />
        <t:MailboxCulture>en-US</t:MailboxCulture>
        <t:TimeZoneContext>
            <t:TimeZoneDefinition Id="Eastern Standard Time"/>
        </t:TimeZoneContext>
    </soap:Header>
    <soap:Body>
        <CreateItem
            xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages" MessageDisposition="SaveOnly">
            <SavedItemFolderId>
                <t:FolderId Id="{{tasksFolderId}}"/>
            </SavedItemFolderId>
            <Items>
                <t:Task>
                    <t:Subject>Test Task</t:Subject>
                    <t:Sensitivity>Normal</t:Sensitivity>
                    <t:Body BodyType="HTML"><html
                        xmlns:o="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office"
                        xmlns:w="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:word"
                        xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/2004/12/omml"
                        xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40"><head><meta http-equiv=Content-Type content="text/html; charset=utf-8"><meta name=Generator content="Microsoft Word 15 (filtered medium)"><style><!--
/* Font Definitions */
@font-face
	{font-family:"Cambria Math";
	panose-1:2 4 5 3 5 4 6 3 2 4;}
@font-face
	{font-family:Calibri;
	panose-1:2 15 5 2 2 2 4 3 2 4;}
/* Style Definitions */
p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal
	{margin:0in;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Calibri",sans-serif;}
span.EmailStyle17
	{mso-style-type:personal-compose;
	font-family:"Calibri",sans-serif;
	color:windowtext;}
.MsoChpDefault
	{mso-style-type:export-only;
	font-family:"Calibri",sans-serif;}
@page WordSection1
	{size:8.5in 11.0in;
	margin:1.0in 1.0in 1.0in 1.0in;}
div.WordSection1
	{page:WordSection1;}
--></style></head><body lang=EN-US link="#0563C1" vlink="#954F72" style='word-wrap:break-word'><div class=WordSection1><p class=MsoNormal>This is a test task<o:p></o:p></p></div></body></html>
                    </t:Body>
                    <t:Importance>Normal</t:Importance>
                    <t:ExtendedProperty>
                        <t:ExtendedFieldURI DistinguishedPropertySetId="Common" PropertyId="34051" PropertyType="Boolean"/>
                        <t:Value>false</t:Value>
                    </t:ExtendedProperty>
                    <t:ExtendedProperty>
                        <t:ExtendedFieldURI DistinguishedPropertySetId="Task" PropertyId="33031" PropertyType="Boolean"/>
                        <t:Value>false</t:Value>
                    </t:ExtendedProperty>
                    <t:DueDate>2020-10-27T11:59:00Z</t:DueDate>
                </t:Task>
            </Items>
        </CreateItem>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

request.description: EWS CreateItem request for creating a task

<soap:Envelope
    xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
    xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types"

request.description: TODO:  Remove the postman.setNextRequest() call in the SetUserPhoto test to re-enable this test once LABS-792 is fixed.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
  <soap:Header>
      <RequestServerVersion Version="Exchange2016" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types"/>
  </soap:Header>
  <soap:Body>
    <SetUserOofSettingsRequest xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages">
      <Mailbox xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
        <Name>leviastan</Name>
        <Address>leviastan@llqdev.onmicrosoft.com</Address>
        <RoutingType>SMTP</RoutingType>
      </Mailbox>
      <UserOofSettings xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
        <OofState>Enabled</OofState>
        <ExternalAudience>All</ExternalAudience>
        <Duration>
          <StartTime>aasdf</StartTime>
          <EndTime>2006-10-25T12:12:00Z</EndTime>
        </Duration>
        <InternalReply>
          <Message>I am out of office.  This is my internal reply.</Message>
        </InternalReply>
        <ExternalReply xml:lang="zh">
          <Message>I am out of office. This is my external reply.</Message>
        </ExternalReply>
        <EventsToDeleteIDs>
        	<EventToDeleteID>AAAAA==</EventToDeleteID>
        	<EventToDeleteID>BBBBB==</EventToDeleteID>
        </EventsToDeleteIDs>
      </UserOofSettings>
    </SetUserOofSettingsRequest>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
               xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types"
               xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages">
   <soap:Header>
    <t:RequestServerVersion Version="Exchange2016" />
   </soap:Header>
   <soap:Body >
    <m:FindPeople>
      <m:PersonaShape>
        <t:BaseShape>IdOnly</t:BaseShape>
        <t:AdditionalProperties>
          <t:FieldURI FieldURI="persona:DisplayName"/>
          <t:IndexedFieldURI FieldURI="persona:Title" FieldIndex="ADAAA=="/>
        </t:AdditionalProperties>
      </m:PersonaShape>
      <m:IndexedPageItemView BasePoint="Beginning" MaxEntriesReturned="100" Offset="0"/>
      <m:ParentFolderId>
        <t:DistinguishedFolderId Id="directory"/>
      </m:ParentFolderId>
      <m:QueryString>query</m:QueryString>
      <m:Restriction>
      	<t:Or>
      		<t:IsEqualTo>
	      		<t:IndexedFieldURI FieldURI="persona:DisplayName" FieldIndex="ADODS==">
	      		</t:IndexedFieldURI>
      			<t:FieldURIOrConstant>
      				<t:Constant Value="tom"></t:Constant>
      			</t:FieldURIOrConstant>
      		</t:IsEqualTo>
      		<t:IsGreaterThan>
	      		<t:IndexedFieldURI FieldURI="persona:DisplayName" FieldIndex="ADODS==">
	      		</t:IndexedFieldURI>
      			<t:FieldURIOrConstant>
      				<t:Constant Value="111"></t:Constant>
      			</t:FieldURIOrConstant>
      		</t:IsGreaterThan>
	      	<t:Exists>
	      		<t:IndexedFieldURI FieldURI="persona:DisplayName" FieldIndex="ADODS==">
	      		</t:IndexedFieldURI>
	      	</t:Exists>
	      	<t:Not>
		      	<t:Exists>
		      		<t:IndexedFieldURI FieldURI="persona:DisplayName" FieldIndex="JDSKS==">
		      		</t:IndexedFieldURI>
		      	</t:Exists>
	      	</t:Not>
	      	<t:Near>
	      		<t:Contains ContainmentMode="FullString" ContainmentComparison="LooseAndIgnoreCase">
		      		<t:IndexedFieldURI FieldURI="persona:DisplayName" FieldIndex="WWWW+=">
		      		</t:IndexedFieldURI>
		      		<t:Constant Value="tom"></t:Constant>
		      	</t:Contains>
	      		<t:Contains ContainmentMode="FullString" ContainmentComparison="LooseAndIgnoreCase">
		      		<t:IndexedFieldURI FieldURI="persona:DisplayName" FieldIndex="WWWW+=">
		      		</t:IndexedFieldURI>
		      		<t:Constant Value="mike"></t:Constant>
		      	</t:Contains>
	      		<t:Distance>100</t:Distance>
	      		<t:Ordered>true</t:Ordered>
	      	</t:Near>
      	</t:Or>
      </m:Restriction>
    </m:FindPeople>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
               xmlns:t="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types">
   <soap:Header>
      <t:RequestServerVersion Version="Exchange2016"/>
   </soap:Header>
   <soap:Body xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages">
      <m:GetPersona>
         <m:PersonaId Id="AAUQAGOh/ljw4f1EnH1ragAAJkA="/>
         <m:ParentFolderId>
         	<m:FolderId Id="AAMkA=" ChangeKey="EQAAABY+"/>
         	<m:AddressListId Id="DKSL=="/>
          	<m:DistinguishedFolderId Id="AAMkA=" ChangeKey="EQAAABY+">
          		<m:Mailbox>
	                <m:Name>leviastan</m:Name>
	                <m:EmailAddress>leviastan@llqdev.onmicrosoft.com</m:EmailAddress>
	                <m:RoutingType>SMTP</m:RoutingType>
	                <m:MailboxType>Mailbox</m:MailboxType>
          		</m:Mailbox>
          	</m:DistinguishedFolderId>
         </m:ParentFolderId>
         <m:AdditionalProperties>
           <t:FieldURI FieldURI="persona:DisplayName"/>
           <t:IndexedFieldURI FieldURI="persona:Title" FieldIndex="ADAAA=="/>
         </m:AdditionalProperties>
      </m:GetPersona>
   </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

    xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
               xmlns:m="https://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages" 
               xmlns:t="https://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types" 
               xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
   <soap:Header>
      <t:RequestServerVersion Version="Exchange2013" />
   </soap:Header>
   <soap:Body>
      <m:GetConversationItems>
         <m:ItemShape>
            <t:BaseShape>IdOnly</t:BaseShape>
            <t:AdditionalProperties>
               <t:FieldURI FieldURI="item:Subject" />
               <t:FieldURI FieldURI="item:DateTimeReceived" />
            </t:AdditionalProperties>
         </m:ItemShape>
         <m:FoldersToIgnore>
            <t:DistinguishedFolderId Id="deleteditems" />
            <t:DistinguishedFolderId Id="drafts" />
         </m:FoldersToIgnore>
         <m:SortOrder>TreeOrderDescending</m:SortOrder>
         <m:Conversations>
            <t:Conversation>
               <t:ConversationId Id="AAQkADEzOTExYjJkakJCs=" />
            </t:Conversation>
         </m:Conversations>
      </m:GetConversationItems>
   </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
               xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
               xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
               xmlns:t="https://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/types"
               xmlns:m="https://schemas.microsoft.com/exchange/services/2006/messages">
  <soap:Header>
    <t:RequestServerVersion Version="Exchange2010_SP1" />
  </soap:Header>
  <soap:Body>
    <m:FindConversation>
      <m:IndexedPageItemView BasePoint="Beginning" MaxEntriesReturned="1" Offset="0"/>
      <m:ParentFolderId>
        <t:DistinguishedFolderId Id ="inbox"/>
      </m:ParentFolderId>
    </m:FindConversation>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

exec: throw new Error("email environment variable not set");
throw new Error("password environment variable not set");
